Pompeo: Lebanon deserves to get rid of Khamenei's intervention
06 Nov 2019, 08:24 by Lebanon 24
On his Twitter account, US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo tweeted that "the Iraqi and Lebanese people want their countries back. They discover that the Iranian regime's highest exports are corruption, badly disguised as a revolution." Pompeo discussed with the Saudi Minister of State for Foreign Affairs Adel al-Jubeir the situation in Yemen, Syria, Iraq and Lebanon. The two ministers discussed the latest developments in Syria, Iraq and Lebanon, Pompeo said. The Trump administration reiterated its support for the Lebanese army and security services, stressing that no spending or procurement has been delayed, without specifying whether the $ 105 million in aid is still on hold.
